summary: Two Scottish friends become local folk heroes and tourist attractions when they start holding up tour buses with novelty items.
cast: Vincent Friell|Joe Mullaney|Teri Lally|Ned Beatty|Robert Urquhart|Bernard Hill|Mel Smith|Bryan Forbes|Nanette Newman|Ann Scott-Jones|Rachel Boyd|Iain McColl|Dave Anderson|Eiji Kusuhara|Ed Bishop|Laura Smith|Robin Brown|Jim Boyce|Andrew Brown|Big D|Jean Faulds|Sabu Kimura|Sally Kinghorn|Frances Lonergan|Sharon MacKenzie|Karen McCrary|Lawrie McNicol|Gordon Neish|Theo Priestley|Peter Pringle|Margaret Robertson|Victoria Rutherford|Derek Starr|Michael Stroud|Irene Sunters|Neville Watchurst
title: Inquietos ciudadanos
